actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that trusts established for the benefit of individuals with disabilities shall be taxed at the same rates as individual taxpayers.
short_title: Tax Fairness for Support of the Permanently Disabled Act

summary.text: Tax Fairness for Support of the Permanently Disabled - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to modify the tax rates for trusts for permanently and totally disabled individuals.

titles.title: Tax Fairness for Support of the Permanently Disabled Act
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that trusts established for the benefit of individuals with disabilities shall be taxed at the same rates as individual taxpayers.
